# Introduction {#doc-intro}

Finally, we'll show how to make a pkgdown website for your package.
This is really important as a public face to your package.
A well designed GitHub repo is useful for developers, but a thoughtfully developed package website will make it much easier for potential users to understand why they might want to learn about your package and will help currents users get help.
